Almond paste.substitution: 1 3/4 cups ground blanched almonds plus 1 1/2 cups powdered sugar plus 1 egg white plus 1 teaspoon almond extract plus 1/4 teaspoon salt

Allspice.substitution: 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon and 1/2 teaspoon ground cloves

Apple pie spice.substitution: 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon, 1/4 teaspoon nutmeg, 1/8 teaspoon ground allspice, and either 1/8 teaspoon ground cardamom, ginger or cloves

Beer.substitution: 1 cup water, white grape juice, apple cider or apple juice, diluted peach or apricot syrups. (Substitute equal amounts of liquid.)

Brandy.substitution: 1 tsp brandy extract plus enough water or liquid called for in recipe to make 1/4 cup

Broth, beef or chicken.substitution: 1 bouillon cube dissolved in 1 cup boiling water

Buttermilk (sour milk).substitution: 1 cup milk plus 1 tablespoons vinegar (white or cider) or lemon juice (let stand 5 minutes before using)

Cajun Spice.substitution: 1/2 teaspoon white pepper, 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder, 1/2 teaspoon onion powder, 1/2 teaspoon ground red pepper, 1/2 teaspoon paprika, and 1/2 teaspoon black pepper

Catsup.substitution: 1 cup tomato sauce, 1/2 cup sugar, and 2 tbsp vinegar for use in cooking)

Chili sauce.substitution: 1 cup tomato sauce, 1/4 cup brown sugar, 2 tbsp vinegar, 1/4 tsp cinnamon, dash of ground cloves, and dash of allspice

Chives, finely chopped.substitution: 2 teaspoons finely chopped green onion tops

Chocolate chips, semi-sweet chips, melte.substitution: 2 squares unsweetened chocolate, 2 tablespoons shortening, and 1/2 cup sugar

Chocolate, semi-sweet.substitution: 1 ounce unsweetened chocolate and 4 teaspoon sugar

Chocolate, unsweetened.substitution: 3 tablespoons cocoa powder plus 1 tablespoon butter or margarine

Cocoa powder, natural unsweetened.substitution: 1 ounce (square) chocolate (decrease fat called for in recipe by 1/2 tablespoon)

Cocoa, Dutch Processed.substitution: 3 tablespoons natural unsweetened cocoa powder plus 1/8 teaspoon baking soda

Coconut cream, canned.substitution: 1 cup heavy cream or whipping cream

Coffee, strong brewed.substitution: 2 tablespoons instant espresso powder dissolved in 3 tablespoons hot water

Condensed cream of mushroom soup.substitution: 1 (10.75 ounce can) condensed cream of celery, cream of chicken, or golden mushroom soup.

Cornmeal, self-rising.substitution: 7/8 cup plain, 1 1/2 tablespoons baking powder, and 1/2 teaspoon salt

Cornmeal, stone ground.substitution: 1 cup regular milled cornmeal, corn grits, polenta, or maize meal

Corn syrup.substitution: 1 cup granulated sugar and 1/4 liquid (use whatever liquid is called for in the recipe)

Cream, half-and-half.substitution: 1/2 cup whole milk, plus 1/2 cup light cream

Cream, heavy (36 to 40% fat).substitution: 3/4 cup milk and 1/3 cup butter or margarine (for use in cooking or baking)

Cream, light (18 to 20% fat).substitution: 3/4 cup milk and 3 tablespoons butter or margarine (for use in cooking or baking)

Cream, whipped.substitution: Chill a 13 ounce can of evaporated milk for 12 hours. Add 1 tablespoon lemon juice. Whip until stiff.

Creme fraiche.substitution: Combine 1 cup heavy cream and 1 tablespoon plain yogurt. Let stand for 6 hours at room temperature

Egg.substitution: 3 tablespoons and 1 teaspoon thawed frozen egg

Egg yolk.substitution: 2 tablespoons sifted, dry egg yolk powder and 2 teaspoons water

Flour, all-purpose (for thickening).substitution: 1 1/2 teaspoon cornstarch, arrowroot starch, potato starch, or rice starch

Flour, cake.substitution: 1 cup sifted all-purpose flour minus 2 tablespoons sifted all-purpose flour

Flour, self-rising.substitution: 1 cup minus 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour plus 1/1/2 tsp baking powder and 1/2 tsp salt

Flour, whole wheat.substitution: Substitute whole wheat flour for 1/4 to 1/2 of the white flour called for in a recipe

Garlic Salt.substitution: 1 medium-size clove or 1/2 teaspoon minced fresh garlic

Gelatin, flavored.substitution: 1 tablespoon plain gelatin and 2 cups fruit juice

Honey.substitution: 1 1/4 cup granulated sugar and 1/4 cup liquid (use liquid called for in recipe)

Hot pepper sauce.substitution: 3/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper plus 1 teaspoon vinegar

Lemon, whole.substitution: 2 tablespoons lemon juice and 2 to 3 teaspoons lemon rind (zest)

Lemon peel, dried.substitution: 1 to 2 teaspoons grated fresh lemon peel (zest)

Maple sugar.substitution: 1 cup maple syrup (reduce liquid in recipe by 1/4 cup)

Maple Syrup.substitution: Combine 2 cups sugar and 1 cup water, bring to clear boil; take off heat; add 1/2 teaspoon maple flavoring

Marshmallow creme.substitution: melt 16 ounces of marshmallows and 3 1/2 tablespoons corn syrup in a double broiler

Milk, skim.substitution: 4 to 5 tablespoons non-fat dry milk powder and enough water to make one cup, or follow manufacturer's directions

Milk, sweetened condensed.substitution: Heat the following ingredients until sugar and butter are dissolved: 1/3 cup and 2 tablespoons evaporated milk, 1 cup sugar, 3 tablespoons butter or margarine

Milk, whole.substitution: 1 cup reconstituted non-fat dry milk and 2 tsp butter or margarine

Molasses.substitution: 1 cup honey, dark corn syrup, maple syrup, brown rice syrup, or barley malt syrup

Mushrooms, fresh.substitution: 3 ounces dried mushrooms plus 1 1/2 cups water

Mustard, Dijon.substitution: 1 tablespoon dry mustard mixed with 1 teaspoon water, 1 teaspoon white wine vinegar, 1 tablespoon mayonnaise, and a pinch of sugar

Nuts, chopped, ground or whole.substitution: 1 cup similar nuts (your favorite) prepared in the same way

Oil (for sauteing).substitution: 1/4 cup melted margarine, butter, bacon drippings, shortening, or lard

Orange, whole.substitution: 6 to 8 tablespoons juice and 2 to 3 tablespoon grated rind (zest)

Orange peel (zest), fresh.substitution: 2 to 3 tablespoons grated fresh orange peel (zest)

Parmesan cheese, grated.substitution: 1/2 cup grated Asiago cheese or grated Romano cheese

Peanut Butter.substitution: 1 cup of another nut butter (such as almond or hazelnut butter)

Peppers, red bell.substitution: 3 tablespoons fresh red bell pepper, chopped

Pimento.substitution: rehydrate 1 tablespoon dried red bell peppers

Poultry seasoning.substitution: 1/2 teaspoon ground sage, 1/2 teaspoon dried thyme, and 1/2 teaspoon dried rosemary

Pumpkin pie spice.substitution: 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon, 1/4 teaspoon ginger, 1/8 teaspoon allspice, and 1/8 teaspoon nutmeg

Rum.substitution: 1 tablespoon rum extract plus enough liquid to make 1/4 cup

Shortening, melted.substitution: 1 cup cooking oil (cooking oil should not be substituted if recipe does not call for

Sour cream, cultured.substitution: 3/4 cup sour milk and 1/3 cup butter or margarine

Sugar, superfine.substitution: 1 cup granulated white sugar processed in a food processor or grinder

Sugar, white.substitution: 1 cup corn syrup, decrease liquid called for in recipe by 1/4 cup (never replace more than 1/2 cup sugar called for in recipe with corn syrup)

Tomatoes, canned.substitution: 1 1/3 cups diced fresh tomatoes simmered 10 minutes

Tomatoes, packed.substitution: 1/2 cup tomato sauce plus 1/2 cup water

Tomato Juice.substitution: 1/2 cup tomato sauce and 1/2 cup water

Tomato Sauce.substitution: 3/4 cup tomato paste plus 1 cup water

Tomato Soup.substitution: 1 cup tomato sauce plus 1/4 oz. can cup water

Treacle.substitution: 1 cup light or dark brown sugar

Vinegar, Balsamic.substitution: 1 tablespoon sherry vinegar or cider vinegar
